review_data.title: Place fell apart, now ripoff
review_data.content: Used to be a regular, loved the selection and especially how you could combine the hamburgers based on your likings. Even needed to book during weekdays as it was so popular. Now..... hugely reduced menu and spiked the prices. Only one burger for 43 Francs....More

review_data.title: Bar recommended but not the restaurant
review_data.content: Unfriendly service, errors with the check that we had to pay even though it was not our fault. “Pushed” us out of the table into the bar once we finished eating. Food ok, service fast. Do not recommend restaurant but would recommend the bar, great...More

review_data.title: Family time
review_data.content: Beautiful Switzerland.We enjoyed a very great walking tour. We also took the train to Lucerne. We did some site seeing there as well. Crossed the famous bridge. We had great accomodayion at a Air BnB. We plan to revist since we did mot have enough...More

review_data.title: Adorable
review_data.content: The most delicious food in town! A must for meat-eaters! A place to be! Great place! I enjoyed it very much!

review_data.title: Good for drinks
review_data.content: Cool stylish place, Great central location and drinks (albeit over priced), bartenders are super cool BUT the food has room for improvement eg terrible flammkuchen (with no plans to imprive).
